overview: Short Films featured at the 2017 Vancouver Latin American Film Festival.  THE DIVER (Esteban Arrangoiz | Mexico) - AYA (Francesca Canepa Sarmiento | Peru) - LANDSCAPE FOR A PERSON (Florencia Levy | Argentina) - CÅSUCKA (Dalia Huerta Cano and Iván Puig | Mexico) - CENTAURO  (Nicolás Suárez | Argentina) - THE HOMICIDE  (Maysel Bello | Cuba) - THE CATS (Alejandro Ríos | Mexico) - SWEDISH COUSIN (Inés Barrionuevo | Argentina)
title: VLAFF Shorts in Competition: Program 1
